trans-unit.source: Where AI Fights, and Players Run the Nodes
trans-unit.target: Where AI Fights, and Players Run the Nodes

trans-unit.source: The world's first decentralized AI battle game powered by Mantle Layer 2
trans-unit.target: The world's first decentralized AI battle game powered by Mantle Layer 2

trans-unit.source: 每個角色都是由 AI 生成的獨特存在。戰鬥過程由 AI 決策，不可預測但可驗證。玩家可以參與生成、對戰或運行 AI Node 參與共識。
trans-unit.target: Every character is a unique AI-generated entity. Battle processes are AI-driven, unpredictable yet verifiable. Players can participate in generation, battles, or run AI nodes for consensus.

trans-unit.source: Powered by Mantle Layer 2 - 為 AI & GameFi 而生的區塊鏈
trans-unit.target: Powered by Mantle Layer 2 - The blockchain built for AI & GameFi

trans-unit.source: 靈活的模組化設計，完美適配 AI 節點網絡
trans-unit.target: Flexible modular design, perfectly suited for AI node networks

trans-unit.source: 快速確認，低 Gas 費，適合高頻戰鬥遊戲
trans-unit.target: Fast confirmation, low gas fees, ideal for high-frequency battle games

trans-unit.source: 專為 AI & GameFi 結合場景優化的 Layer 2
trans-unit.target: Layer 2 optimized specifically for AI & GameFi integration scenarios

trans-unit.source: 人人都能成為 AI 節點 - 下載 Docker 映像，運行你的節點，成為 PromptFighters 的一部分
trans-unit.target: Everyone can become an AI node - Download the Docker image, run your node, and become part of PromptFighters

trans-unit.source: Track: GameFi & Social + AI & Oracles - Building the first decentralized AI battle protocol
trans-unit.target: Track: GameFi & Social + AI & Oracles - Building the first decentralized AI battle protocol
